desc: Same-day affordable COVID-19 testing in Fort Lauderdale. Visit us or we can come to your location to perform a COVID-19 test. Both the PCR nasal swabs and the COVID-19 antibody blood test can be performed at your location. Call 954-530-4447

layout.text: Covid-19 testing simplified. COVID19 PCR NASAL SWAB TEST - NEXT DAY RESULTS! Only $179.00
